description.p: Prerequisite: Alchemist
You are particularly efficient at crafting potions and poisons, and gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You can craft potions, poisons, and other alchemical concoctions with half the cost and time.

sheet.description: You can craft potions, poisons, and other alchemical concoctions with half the cost and time.

description.p: Prerequisite: Artillerist
The arcane cannons that you form are particularly long range and accurate. The range of your cannons doubles.

sheet.description: The range of your cannons doubles.

description.p: Prerequisite: Battle Smith
You modify your steel defender to be particularly adept at a specific task. It gains proficiency in two skills of your choice.
Your companion gains proficiency in Acrobatics.
Your companion gains proficiency in Animal Handling.
Your companion gains proficiency in Arcana.
Your companion gains proficiency in Athletics.
Your companion gains proficiency in Deception.
Your companion gains proficiency in History.
Your companion gains proficiency in Insight.
Your companion gains proficiency in Intimidation.
Your companion gains proficiency in Investigation.
Your companion gains proficiency in Medicine.
Your companion gains proficiency in Nature.
Your companion gains proficiency in Perception.
Your companion gains proficiency in Performance.
Your companion gains proficiency in Persuasion.
Your companion gains proficiency in Religion.
Your companion gains proficiency in Sleight of Hand.
Your companion gains proficiency in Stealth.
Your companion gains proficiency in Survival.
Prerequisite: Path of the Ancestral Guardian
You can call upon your ancestral spirits to heal your allies. You learn the prayer of healing spell and can cast it once per long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

sheet.description: You can cast prayer of healing using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability.

description.p: Prerequisite: Path of the Battlerager

You enhance your armor spikes. You can now craft heavy spiked armor, with which you are proficienct. It costs 350 gp to craft, and grants you an Armor Class of 17. Your armor spikes deal 1d8 piercing damage.
Despite this armor being heavy armor, you may still rage while wearing it.

sheet.description: You can now craft heavy spiked armor, with which you are proficienct. It costs 350 gp to craft, and grants you an Armor Class of 17. Your armor spikes deal 1d8 piercing damage. You can rage while wearing this armor.

description.p: Prerequisite: Path of the Berserker
You are particularly resilient and can keep fighting unhindered even after a frenzy. Once per long rest, you can ignore the exhaustion penalty of entering a frenzy.

sheet.description: You can ignore the exhaustion penalty of entering a frenzy.

description.p: Prerequisite: Path of the Storm Herald
The stormy magic within you keeps fighting even when you do not. If you are ever reduced to 0 hit points and must make death saves, while you still live your storm aura remains active.

sheet.description: If you are ever reduced to 0 hit points and must make death saves, while you still live your storm aura remains active.

description.p: Prerequisite: Path of the Totem Warrior
Your tribe worships a full pantheon of totems, rather than a single one. When you finish a long rest, you can change any of your totemic abilities to a different type.

sheet.description: When you finish a long rest, you can change any of your totemic abilities to a different type.

description.p: Prerequisite: Path of the Zealot
Your divine ability redirects some of your damage into your own vitality. When you deal damage using your Divine Fury feature, you gain temporary hit points equal to the extra damage you deal.

sheet.description: When you deal damage using your Divine Fury feature, you gain temporary hit points equal to the extra damage you deal.

description.p: Prerequisite: College of Glamour
You are particularly charming. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You gain proficiency in the Persuasion skill, and your proficiency bonus is doubled for any check you make with it.
You learn the charm person spell and can cast it once per long rest without expending a spell slot. It does not count against the number of spells you know.

sheet.description: You can cast it once per long rest without expending a spell slot.

description.p: Prerequisite: College of Lore
You are devoted to keeping history and lore intact, to an almost fanatical degree. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You gain proficiency in the History skill, and your proficiency bonus is doubled for any check you make with it.
As an action, you may touch an object and magically learn anything of note that happened to it within the past three days. You may do this once per long rest.

sheet.description: You may touch an object and magically learn anything of note that happened to it within the past three days.

description.p: Prerequisite: College of Swords
Your flourishes are particularly elaborate and fancy. You may add your Dexterity modifier (minimum of +1) to your bardic inspiration die when you perform a flourish.

sheet.description: You may add +{{fancy-flourish:bonus}} to your bardic inspiration die when you perform a flourish.

description.p: Prerequisite: College of Valor

As an action on your turn, you can begin singing a battle song that lasts until the start of your next turn. Creatures of your choice that can hear you within 30 feet gain advantage on the first attack roll they make on their next turn.
You can use this feature three times per long rest, and regain all expended uses on a long rest.

sheet.description: On your turn, you can begin singing a battle song that lasts until the start of your next turn. Creatures of your choice that can hear you within 30 feet gain advantage on the first attack roll they make on their next turn.

description.p: Prerequisite: College of Whispers

You are an expert of using ambient sounds to create a pseudo-song. When you are hidden, you can cast bard spells without using verbal components. Due to its nature, vicious mockery cannot be cast in this way.

sheet.description: When you are hidden, you can cast bard spells without using verbal components. Vicious mockery cannot be cast in this way

description.p: Prerequisite: Arcana Domain
Your patron deity has blessed you with increased knowledge of the arcane. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
When you make an Arcana check, you add double your proficiency bonus to the roll.
You have advantage on checks made to identify a spell being cast.

sheet.description: You have advantage on checks made to identify a spell being cast.

description.p: Prerequisite: Death Domain
Your patron deity has imposed within you extended vitality and endurance by making you partially undead. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage on any ability checks or saving throws made to go without food, water, sleep, or other mortal necessities.

sheet.description: You have advantage on any ability checks or saving throws made to go without food, water, sleep, or other mortal necessities.

description.p: Prerequisite: Forge Domain
Your patron deity has given you expanded knowledge of smithing. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
When you make a check with smith’s tools, you add double your proficiency bonus to the roll.
The time required to forge anything is halved for you.

sheet.description: When you make a check with smith’s tools, you add double your proficiency bonus to the roll. The time required to forge anything is halved for you.

description.p: Prerequisite: Grave Domain
Your patron deity has given you expanded knowledge on undead creatures and how to fight them. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You have advantage on all attack rolls made against undead creatures with a CR less than or equal to your level.
You have advantage on any check made to recall information about or track undead creatures.

sheet.description: You have advantage on all attack rolls made against undead creatures with a CR less than or equal to {{level:cleric}}.

description.p: Prerequisite: Knowledge Domain
Your patron deity has expanded your mind to allow you to better understand anything. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
As a bonus action, you can give yourself advantage on any Intelligence skill check. You can do this a number of times per long rest equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of once).

sheet.description: You can give yourself advantage on any Intelligence skill check.

description.p: Prerequisite: Life Domain
Your patron deity has bestowed additional healing power to you. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You are proficient in the Medicine skill if you weren’t already.
When you cast a healing spell, it heals a minimum number of hit points equal to twice your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 2).

sheet.description: When you cast a healing spell, it heals a minimum of {{god-of-life:minimum-hp}} hit points.

description.p: Prerequisite: Light Domain
Your patron deity has infused you with light, permeating the core of your being. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You gain resistance to radiant damage.
Spells you cast that deal radiant damage ignore resistances, and you may reroll any 1s or 2s. You must use the new roll.

sheet.description: Spells you cast that deal radiant damage ignore resistances, and you may reroll any 1s or 2s. You must use the new roll.

description.p: Prerequisite: Nature Domain

Your patron deity has infused you with a special kinship to nature. You gain one use of the druid’s Wild Shape ability. You have an effective druid level of half your cleric level for the purposes of wild shaping.

sheet.description: You gain one use of the druid’s Wild Shape ability. You have an effective druid level of {{level:cleric:half}} for the purposes of wild shaping.

description.p: Prerequisite: Order Domain

Your patron deity allows you to invoke order on the battlefield. When a creautre within 30 feet of you that you can see makes a roll with advantage or disadvantage, you can use your reaction to remove the advantage or disadvantage.
You may use this ability a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and regain all expended uses on a long rest.

sheet.description: When a creautre within 30 feet of you that you can see makes a roll with advantage or disadvantage, you can use your reaction to remove the advantage or disadvantage.

description.p: Prerequisite: Tempest Domain
Your patron deity grants you increased power, the lightning of their magic permeating every fibre of your being. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You gain resistance to lightning damage.
The lightning bolt spell is added to your list of domain spells, and you may cast it as a 3rd-level spell once per long rest.

sheet.description: You may cast lightning bolt as a 3rd-level spell once per long rest.

description.p: Prerequisite: Trickery Domain
Your patron deity infuses you with the essence of trickery and misdirection. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
After using your Channel Divinity or casting a spell of 1st-level or higher, you may Dash, Disengage, or Hide as a bonus action.

sheet.description: After using your Channel Divinity or casting a spell of 1st-level or higher, you may Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

description.p: Prerequisite: War Domain
Your patron deity infuses your body with power, making you more effective in combat. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
As a free action on your turn, you may expend a spell slot to regain uses of your War Priest feature. The number of uses gained is equal to the level of the spell slot expended.

sheet.description: As a free action on your turn, you may expend a spell slot to regain uses of your War Priest feature. The number of uses gained is equal to the level of the spell slot expended.

description.p: Prerequisite: Circle of Dreams
Your healing with your Balm of the Summer Court feature is especially powerful. The dice used for this feature change to d8s.

sheet.description: The dice used for your Balm of Summer Court change to d8s.

description.p: Prerequisite: Circle of Spores
You know what of fungus can and can’t hurt you, and have learned to be almost fungal yourself. You gain the following beneifts:

ul.li: You have immunity to disease.
You have resistance to poison damage.
You have advantage on saving throws made to resist being poisoned.

sheet.description: You have immunity to disease. You have advantage on saving throws made to resist being poisoned.

description.p: Prerequisite: Circle of the Land
You are an expert of your chosen land type, and gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You can travel at double pace through your land type.
You have advantage on any Survival checks made to find food or track creatures within your chosen land type.
While in your chosen land type, you can cast the circle spells you gain at 3rd level without expending a spell slot once per long rest.

sheet.description: You can travel at double pace through your land type. You have advantage on any Survival checks made to find food or track creatures within your chosen land type. While in your chosen land type, you can cast the circle spells you gain at 3rd level without expending a spell slot once per long rest.

description.p: Prerequisite: Circle of the Moon
You are an expert at manipulating natural magic to wild shape. While wild shaped, you may add your Wisdom modifier to your Armor Class, and you needn’t have seen a beast to wild shape into it.

sheet.description: While wild shaped, you may add {{wisdom:modifier}} to your Armor Class, and you needn’t have seen a beast to wild shape into it.

description.p: Prerequisite: Circle of the Shepherd
You learn the find familar spell and can cast it as a ritual. When you cast this spell, the familar is always fey, and can also be a mastiff, dolphin, giant crab, giant frog, sheep, vulture, or wolf.

sheet.description: You can cast find familiar as a ritual. When you cast this spell, the familar is always fey, and can also be a mastiff, dolphin, giant crab, giant frog, sheep, vulture, or wolf.

description.p: Prerequisite: Arcane Archer
You are well-versed in all kinds of arcane archer lore. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You gain proficiency in the Arcana or Nature skill.
You learn either the prestidigitation or druidcraft cantrip.
You gain an additional use of your arcane shot.

sheet.description: You gain an additional use of your arcane shot.

description.p: Prerequisite: Banneret or Purple Dragon Knight

You are unstoppable when you set your mind to something, and this shows through your actions and abilities. When you use your Rallying Cry feature, you and the targets of the feature can immediatley make a saving throw at advantage against an effect causing them to be charmed or frightened.

sheet.description: When you use your Rallying Cry feature, you and the targets of the feature can immediatley make a saving throw at advantage against an effect causing them to be charmed or frightened.

description.p: Prerequisite: Battle Master
You are an expert at using your specialized maneuvers in a pinch. When you are hit with a critical hit, you regain one superiority die.
In addition, you gain an additional superiority die, and once per long rest you may maximize the roll of one of your superiority dice.

sheet.description: When you are hit with a critical hit, you regain one superiority die. Once per long rest you may maximize the roll of one of your superiority dice.

description.p: Prerequisite: Cavalier
You are particularly adept at fighting on horseback, and gain the following benefits while mounted on a controlled mount:

ul.li: If you are weilding a weapon with the versatile property, it gains the reach property.
You can spur your mount into a full gallop as a bonus action, tripling its speed until the start of your next turn. You can use this feature once per long rest.
Your mount has resistance to all damage.

sheet.description: If you are weilding a weapon with the versatile property, it gains the reach property. You can spur your mount into a full gallop as a bonus action, tripling its speed until the start of your next turn. You can use this feature once per long rest. Your mount has resistance to all damage.

description.p: Prerequisite: Champion
You are an unstoppable force on the battlefield. When you score a critical hit, you may add one additional damage die to the roll.

sheet.description: When you score a critical hit, you may add one additional damage die to the roll.

description.p: Prerequisite: Eldritch Knight
You have spent a significant amount of time studying the arcane, more so than other eldritch knights. The spells you learn can be from any school.

sheet.description: The spells you learn can be from any school.

description.p: Prerequisite: Samurai
Your fighting spirit is enhanced to make you especially adept at combat. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Strength, Dexterity, or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
When you use your Action Surge or Second Wind abilities, you automatically gain the benefits of your Fighting Spirit ability.

sheet.description: When you use your Action Surge or Second Wind abilities, you automatically gain the benefits of your Fighting Spirit ability.

description.p: Prerequisite: Way of Shadow

You are extremely stealthy, even for monks who follow the way of shadow. You gain proficiency in the Stealth skill if you don’t already have it, and you double your proficiency bonus for any checks made with it.
In addition, the spells you are able to cast with ki points now only cost 1 ki point to cast.

sheet.description: In addition, the spells you are able to cast with ki points now only cost 1 ki point to cast.

description.p: Prerequisite: Way of the Drunken Master
While you can imitate the effects of fighting while drunk even while sober, you become more powerful while drunk. You gain the following benefits while drunk:

ul.li: You do not suffer the negative effects of being drunk.
You gain an additional attack when you use Flurry of Blows.

sheet.description: You do not suffer the negative effects of being drunk. You gain an additional attack when you use Flurry of Blows.

description.p: Prerequisite: Way of the Four Elements

You are especially attuned to elemental magic. Choose one of the elemental disciplines available at 3rd level. You may now use this discipline without spending ki points a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once) and regain all expended uses of this feature on a long rest.

sheet.description: Choose one of the elemental disciplines available at 3rd level. You may now use this discipline without spending ki points.

description.p: Prerequisite: Way of the Kensei
Some monks who follow the way of the kensei use larger weapons, using the weight and interia of their weapon to crush their foes. When you take this feat, you gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Select one weapon with the heavy property. It is now considered a kensei weapon for you.
If you are weilding a kensei weapon with the heavy property and you have advantage on your attack roll, if the lower of the two rolls would have also hit, you knock the target prone.

description.p: You can take this feat multiple times. If you do so, choose a different weapon with the heavy property each time.

sheet.description: If you are weilding a kensei weapon with the heavy property and you have advantage on your attack roll, if the lower of the two rolls would have also hit, you knock the target prone.

description.p: Prerequisite: Way of the Long Death

You are so obsessed with the nature of life and death that you can stop death under some circumstances. You learn the spare the dying cantrip, and can cast it as a bonus action with a range of 30 feet.

sheet.description: You can cast spare the dying as a bonus action with a range of 30 feet.

description.p: Prerequisite: Way of the Open Hand
You are particularly adept at manipulating your target’s ki. Whenever you use your Open Hand Technique feature, you can impose two of the effects rather than one.

sheet.description: Whenever you use your Open Hand Technique feature, you can impose two of the effects rather than one.

description.p: Prerequisite: Way of the Sun Soul

The light of your abilities is searing in its intensity. Whenever you deal damage with your Radiant Sun Bolt or Searing Sunburst ability you deal an extra amount of fire damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of one damage). In addition, the target must make a Constitution saving throw, or take an equal amount of fire damage at the start of their next turn.

sheet.description: Whenever you deal damage with your Radiant Sun Bolt or Searing Sunburst ability you deal an extra {{burning-light:damage}} fire damage. In addition, the target must make a Constitution saving throw, or take an equal amount of fire damage at the start of their next turn.

description.p: Prerequisite: Oath of Conquest

Tales of your conquest are spread across all corners of the world. You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill, and you gain advantage on rolls with it if the target of your intimidation has an Intelligence score of 6 or higher.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Intimidation rolls if the target of your intimidation has an Intelligence score of 6 or higher.

description.p: Prerequisite: Oath of Devotion
You are so devoted to your oath that it manifests as radiant magic. You learn two cleric cantrips of your choice, which are considered paladin spells for you.
In addition, you learn one 1st-level cleric spell of your choice. It counts as a paladin spell for you, and you may cast it without expending a spell slot once per long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast your Radiant Templar spell once per long rest without using a spell slot.

description.p: Prerequisite: Oath of Redemption
You are exceptionally defensive in your fighting style, of both yourself and your allies. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Enemies within 5 feet of you do not gain advantage from flanking.
You gain the benefits of the Protection fighting style. If you already have it, you gain the benefits of the Defense fighting style.

sheet.description: Enemies within 5 feet of you do not gain advantage from flanking.

description.p: Prerequisite: Oath of the Ancients
Your commitment to ancient spirits and fey manifests as natural magic. You learn two druid cantrips of your choice, which are considered paladin spells for you.
In addition, you learn one 1st-level druid spell of your choice. It counts as a paldin spell for you, and you may cast it without expending a spell slot once per long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast your Ancient spell once per long rest without using a spell slot.

description.p: Prerequisite: Oath of the Crown

You are accustomed to royalty and nobility. You gain proficiency in the Persuasion skill if you don’t already have it, and gain advantage on any Intelligence checks made to recall information about royalty.

sheet.description: You have advantage on any Intelligence checks made to recall information about royalty.

description.p: Prerequisite: Oath of Vengeance
Your oath partially manifests as a fiery power within you. This extra power grants you the following benefits:

ul.li: You learn the fire bolt cantrip, and it is considered a paladin spell for you.
You can cast burning hands and hellish rebuke once per long rest each. They are both considered paladin spells for you.

sheet.description: You can cast burning hands and hellish rebuke once per long rest each.

description.p: Prerequisite: Oathbreaker

You believe that the only way to destroy the forces of evil is to submit to a lesser evil to gain their power. You learn two warlock cantrips of your choice, which are considered paladin spells for you.

In addition, you gain one warlock invocation. You may not take any invocations that require a specific subclass or pact boon. Your warlock level is considered to be half your paladin level for the purposes of which invocations are available to you.

select.name: Eldritch Invocation, Fight Fire with Fire

description.p: Prerequisite: Beast Master Conclave
You and your beast companion are truly formidable in combat together. You may now command your companion to attack as a bonus action, instead of an acton.
In addition, if your beast dies in combat, you may expend a spell slot to instantly revive it as an action.

sheet.description: You may now command your companion to attack as a bonus action, instead of an acton. In addition, if your beast dies in combat, you may expend a spell slot to instantly revive it as an action.

description.p: Prerequisite: Gloom Stalker Conclave
The darkness that you made your home caused your magic to adapt somewhat. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Your darkvision works in magical darkness, as well as mundane darkness.
You learn the darkness spell. If you have 3rd-level spell slots available, it functions normally. If you do not, you may cast it as a 3rd-level spell once per long rest.

sheet.description: Your darkvision works in magical darkness, as well as mundane darkness. You learn the darkness spell. If you have 3rd-level spell slots available, it functions normally. If you do not, you may cast it as a 3rd-level spell once per long rest.

description.p: Prerequisite: Horizon Walker Conclave
You have devoted your life to study of the planes of existence. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage on any checks made to recall information about planes other than the material plane or their inhabitants.

sheet.description: You have advantage on any checks made to recall information about planes other than the material plane or their inhabitants.

description.p: Prerequisite: Hunter Conclave

You are quick to adapt to any situation, and can change your hunting methods easily. Once per long rest, as a bonus action, you may change one of the choices made for Hunter class features, whether it be Hunter’s Prey, Defensive Tactics, Multiattack, or Superior Hunter’s Defense.

sheet.description: You may change one of the choices made for Hunter class features, whether it be Hunter’s Prey, Defensive Tactics, Multiattack, or Superior Hunter’s Defense.

description.p: Prerequisite: Monster Hunter Conclave
You have undergone significant magical treatment to understand your foe. You gain a benefit depending on your favored enemy:

ul.li: Abberations. Your mind is sharpened. You gain resistance to psychic damage.
Beasts. You have learned to communicate with beasts more easily. You learn the speak with animals spell, and may cast it as a ritual.
Celestials. You have learned how celestials fight. You gain resistance to radiant damage.
Constructs. You have learned where to hit to most easily dismantle constructs. Attack rolls made against constructs count as magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunity.

Dragons. You have learned to better avoid a dragon’s breath weapon. When you make a saving throw against a dragon’s breath weapon, you take half damage on a failed save and no damage on a successful save.
Elementals. You have learned how to trap elementals. You may grapple Air, Fire, and Water elementals, and Earth elementals lose their Earth Glide ability while within 30 feet of you.
Fey. You are hardened against fey magic. You gain immunity to the charmed condition.
Fiends. You have learned to combat the denizens of the Nine Hells and the Abyss. You gain resistance to fire damage.
Giants. You have learned to more easily fight large foes. Creatures of the giant type have disadvantage on attack rolls if you moved during your last turn.
Humanoids. You have learned more about the customs and nature of your chosen humanoid races. You may add your proficiency bonus to any checks made to recall information about them.
Monstrosities. You have steeled yourself against horrible sights. You have immunitiy to the frightened conditon.
Oozes. You have learned how to easily identify oozes. They lose any effects that allow them to appear as stationary objects or appear invisible.
Plants. You have learned to destroy plants easily. Attack rolls made against creatures with the plant type have advantage.
Undead. You have become resistant to necromantic magic. You have resistance to necrotic damage, and should you die your body cannot become undead by any means short of the wish spell.

description.p: When you gain more favored enemies, you also gain the benefits associated with them.
Your mind is sharpened. You gain resistance to psychic damage.
You have learned to communicate with beasts more easily. You learn the speak with animals spell, and may cast it as a ritual.

sheet.description: You may cast speak with animals as a ritual.

description.p: You have learned how celestials fight. You gain resistance to radiant damage.
You have learned where to hit to most easily dismantle constructs. Attack rolls made against constructs count as magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunity.

sheet.description: Attack rolls made against constructs count as magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunity.

description.p: You have learned to better avoid a dragon’s breath weapon. When you make a saving throw against a dragon’s breath weapon, you take half damage on a failed save and no damage on a successful save.

sheet.description: When you make a saving throw against a dragon’s breath weapon, you take half damage on a failed save and no damage on a successful save.

description.p: You have learned how to trap elementals. You may grapple Air, Fire, and Water elementals, and Earth elementals lose their Earth Glide ability while within 30 feet of you.

sheet.description: You may grapple Air, Fire, and Water elementals, and Earth elementals lose their Earth Glide ability while within 30 feet of you.

description.p: You are hardened against fey magic. You gain immunity to the charmed condition.

sheet.description: You have immunity to the charmed condition.

description.p: You have learned to combat the denizens of the Nine Hells and the Abyss. You gain resistance to fire damage.
You have learned to more easily fight large foes. Creatures of the giant type have disadvantage on attack rolls if you moved during your last turn.

sheet.description: Creatures of the giant type have disadvantage on attack rolls if you moved during your last turn.

description.p: You have steeled yourself against horrible sights. You have immunitiy to the frightened conditon.

sheet.description: You have immunitiy to the frightened conditon.

description.p: You have learned how to easily identify oozes. They lose any effects that allow them to appear as stationary objects or appear invisible.

sheet.description: Oozes lose any effects that allow them to appear as stationary objects or appear invisible to you.

description.p: You have learned to destroy plants easily. Attack rolls made against creatures with the plant type have advantage.

sheet.description: Attack rolls made against creatures with the plant type have advantage.

description.p: You have become resistant to necromantic magic. You have resistance to necrotic damage, and should you die your body cannot become undead by any means short of the wish spell.

sheet.description: Should you die your body cannot become undead by any means short of the wish spell.

description.p: You have learned more about the customs and nature of your chosen humanoid races. You may add your proficiency bonus to any checks made to recall information about them.

sheet.description: You may add your proficiency bonus to any checks made to recall information about your chosen humanoid favored enemy.

description.p: You have learned more about the customs and nature of your chosen humanoid races. You may add your proficiency bonus to any checks made to recall information about them.

sheet.description: You may add your proficiency bonus to any checks made to recall information about your chosen humanoid favored enemy.

description.p: You have learned more about the customs and nature of your chosen humanoid races. You may add your proficiency bonus to any checks made to recall information about them.

sheet.description: You may add your proficiency bonus to any checks made to recall information about your chosen humanoid favored enemy.

description.p: Prerequisite: Arcane Trickster
You are a particularly clever trickster. You may learn spells from any school.
Prerequisite: Assassin
You can enter into combat in a split second if necessary. You gain a +10 bonus to initiative on the first round of combat if you are not surprised.

sheet.description: You gain a +10 bonus to initiative on the first round of combat if you are not surprised.

description.p: Prerequisite: Inquisitive
You are impossible to fool through illusions at close range. You gain 5 feet of truesight. When you gain the Unerring Eye feature, this range increases to 15 feet.

sheet.description: You gain {{incredibly-astute:range}} feet of truesight.

description.p: Prerequisite: Mastermind

You always have a plan. As a bonus action or reaction, you may grant yourself advantage on a single attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. You may use this ability a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of once), and regain all expended uses on a long rest.

sheet.description: As a bonus action or reaction, you may grant yourself advantage on a single attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

description.p: Prerequisite: Scout

You are quick on your feet, and hard to hit while moving. Opportunity attacks made against you have disadvantage on the attack roll. If an opportunity attack misses you, you automatically gain the benefits of disengaging.

sheet.description: Opportunity attacks made against you have disadvantage on the attack roll. If an opportunity attack misses you, you automatically gain the benefits of disengaging.

description.p: Prerequisite: Swashbuckler

Many swashbucklers don’t even need to fight, as their intimidation is able to win fights for them. You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill, and your proficiency bonus is doubled for checks made with it.

In addtion, when you gain the Panache feature, you may make an Intimidation check instead of a Persuasion check. The effects on a hostile creature are unchanged, but a nonhostile creature will regard you with fear instead of friendliness.
Prerequisite: Thief
Your skills as a burglar and pickpocket are unrivaled. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You gain proficiency in the Sleight of Hand skill, and your proficiency bonus is doubled for checks made with it.
Picking locks takes half the time for you, and your proficiency bonus is doubled for checks made to do so.

sheet.description: Picking locks takes half the time for you, and your proficiency bonus is doubled for checks made to do so.

description.p: Prerequisite: Draconic Bloodline
Your ancestry includes the power of the dragon goddess Tiamat. You count as being descended from Black, Blue, Green, Red, and White dragons.
In addition, you may gain resistance to two damage types when you use your Elemental Affinity feature.

sheet.description: You count as being descended from Black, Blue, Green, Red, and White dragons.

description.p: Prerequisite: Divine Soul

Your power includes the ability to blast radiant energy from your body as an attack against nearby creatures. As an action, you can cause this blast. Creatures within 10 feet must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or take 2d6 radiant damage and be blinded for one minute. Creatures that succeed on the save take half damage and aren’t blinded.
You may use this ability once per long rest at no cost. Any subsequent uses cost 4 sorcery points.

sheet.description: Creatures within 10 feet must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or take 2d6 radiant damage and be blinded for one minute. Creatures that succeed on the save take half damage and aren’t blinded. You may use this ability once per long rest at no cost. Any subsequent uses cost 4 sorcery points.

description.p: Prerequisite: Shadow Magic
You are adept at using your magic to fight while in darkness. If you are in dim light or darkness, you may spend 3 sorcery points to cast shadow blade without needing concentration.

sheet.description: If you are in dim light or darkness, you may spend 3 sorcery points to cast shadow blade without needing concentration.

description.p: Prerequisite: Storm Sorcery

You are so suffused with storm magic the spells you cast are extrordinarily potent. When you cast a spell that deals lightning or thunder damage, you may forgo rolling damage to deal the average amount of damage plus your sorcerer level.
You may use this ability a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once) and regain all expended uses on a long rest.

sheet.description: When you cast a spell that deals lightning or thunder damage, you may forgo rolling damage to deal the average amount of damage plus {{level:sorcerer}}.

description.p: Prerequisite: Wild Magic

Your connection to raw magic is strong enough for you to conciousley tap into it. As an action, you may expend a spell slot. Roll on the Wild Magic Surge table once for each level of the spell slot expended, causing all effects rolled simultanously.

sheet.description: You may expend a spell slot. Roll on the Wild Magic Surge table once for each level of the spell slot expended, causing all effects rolled simultanously.

description.p: Prerequisite: Archfey Patron
You have gained resistance to fey trickery. If your patron is seelie fey, you are immune to being charmed. If your patron is unseelie fey, you are immune to being frightened.

sheet.description: If your patron is seelie fey, you are immune to being charmed. If your patron is unseelie fey, you are immune to being frightened.

description.p: Prerequisite: Celestial Patron
The healing light granted by your patron is more powerful. It heals a minimum number of hit points equal to twice your Charisma modifier (minimum of two) when used.

sheet.description: The healing light granted by your patron is more powerful. It heals a minimum of {{empower-light:healing-hp}} hit points.

description.p: Prerequisite: Fiend Patron
Your patron grants you powerful fiendish magic. You know the fire bolt cantrip, and it is considered a warlock spell for you.
In addition, you may cast the fireball spell once as a 3rd-level spell, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short rest.

sheet.description: You may cast the fireball spell once as a 3rd-level spell.

description.p: Prerequisite: Great Old One Patron

You know the horrors of the universe. As an action, you can magically share them with another creature within 15 feet in an attempt to frighten them. They must make a Wisdom save against your spell save DC, or they are frightened of you for one minute. Creatures may repeat the save at the start of each of their turns, ending the effect on themselves on a success.
You may use this feature once, and regain the ability to do so after you finish a short rest.

sheet.description: A creature within 15 feet must make a Wisdom save against your spell save DC, or they are frightened of you for one minute. Creatures may repeat the save at the start of each of their turns, ending the effect on themselves on a success.

description.p: Prerequisite: Hexblade Patron

Your patron has granted you increased prowess on the battlefield. You may add half your Charisma bonus, rounded down (minimum of +1), to your Armor Class while you are channeling power into a weapon through your Hex Warrior ability.

sheet.description: You may add half your Charisma bonus, rounded down (minimum of +1), to your Armor Class while you are channeling power into a weapon through your Hex Warrior ability.

description.p: Prerequisite: Undying Patron
Through study with your patron, you are almost a lich yourself. You gain resistance to necrotic and poison damage, and immunity to disease.

sheet.description: You are immune to disease.

description.p: Prerequisite: School of Abjuration

You have developed a special abjuration cantrip, called Block. It is cast as reaction when a creature within 10 feet makes an attack roll against a creature other than you, and imposes disadvantage on the roll.
You know the cantrip, and it doesn’t count against your number of wizard cantrips known.
This spell imposes disadvantage on an attack made by a creature within 10 feet of you against a creature other than you.

setters.set: 1 reaction, which you take when a creature within 10 feet makes an attack roll against a creature other than you

description.p: Prerequisite: Bladesinger
The magic woven into your bladesong is particularly powerful. While it is active, you gain the following beneifts:

ul.li: Checks made to grapple you have disadvantage.
Your weapon attacks deal extra damage equal to half you Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).

description.p: In addition, if you have no uses of your bladesong available, you may expend a spell slot of 2nd-level or higher instead.

sheet.description: While your bladesong is active, checks made to grapple you have disadvantage and your weapon attacks deal extra damage equal to half you Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).

description.p: Prerequisite: School of Conjuration

You have developed a special conjuration cantrip, called Lesser Summon. It requires verbal and somatic components, and is cast as an action. You may summon a creature with CR 1/4 or lower or four creatures of CR 0. They act as normal summons and last for one minute. The cantrip requires concentration to keep the summons active.
You know the cantrip, and it doesn’t count against your number of wizard cantrips known.
This spell summons a creature with CR 1/4 or lower or four creatures of CR 0. The summons last for 1 minute.
Prerequisite: School of Divination

You have developed a special divination cantrip, called Glimpse. It requires verbal and somatic components, and is cast as a bonus action, and allows you to take one turn outside the normal flow of time. When this special turn ends, time snaps back to when you cast the spell, with all effects being reversed. However, you remember the effects seen. Glimpse cannot be cast during your temporary turn or on two subsequent turns.
You know the cantrip, and it doesn’t count against your number of wizard cantrips known.

Prerequisite: School of Enchantment

You have developed a special enchantment cantrip, called Glorious Song. It requires verbal and somatic components, and is cast as an action. Creatures of your choice within 120 feet must make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failure, they must spend all of their movement on their turn to move towards you as beautiful music emanates from you. Creatures who are deafened or have an Intelligence of 4 or lower are immune to this effect. The song lasts for one minute or until you end with no action required, and requires concentration.

Creatures may repeat the saving throw at the end of their turns, ending the effect on a success. Creatures affected by the spell will not do anything obviously harmful to reach you, such as fall in a pit or walk into a sword. They will however ignore their own provocation of opportunity attacks.
You know the cantrip, and it doesn’t count against your number of wizard cantrips known.

Prerequisite: School of Evocation

You have developed a special evocation cantrip, called Multi-bolt. It requires verbal and somatic components, is cast as an action, and has a range of 120 feet. You make a ranged spell attack against the target, and it deals 1d12 damage of a damage type of your choice. The damage increases to 2d12 at 5th level, 3d12 at 11th level, and 4d12 at 17th level.
You know the cantrip, and it doesn’t count against your number of wizard cantrips known.
You make a ranged spell attack against the target, and it deals 1d12 damage of a damage type of your choice. The damage increases to 2d12 at 5th level, 3d12 at 11th level, and 4d12 at 17th level.
Prerequisite: School of Illusion

You have developed a special illusion cantrip, called Phantasm. It requires verbal components, and is cast as an action against a creature within 10 feet. The creature must make a Wisdom saving throw, or be frightened of an illusory warrior at a point of you choice within 5 feet of you for one minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw on the end of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
You know the cantrip, and it doesn’t count against your number of wizard cantrips known.

A creature within 10 feet must make a Wisdom saving throw, or be frightened of an illusory warrior at a point of you choice within 5 feet of you for one minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw on the end of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
Prerequisite: School of Necromancy

You have developed a special necromancy cantrip, called Raise Zombie. It requires verbal and somatic components, and is cast as an action, and summons a single zombie to fight for you within 5 feet. The zombie is controlled by you, moves immediatley after you in combat, and lasts until the start of your next turn, at which time it crumbles to dust. It is considered an ally for the purposes of abilities that affect allies, such as flanking. The cantrip requires concentration to keep your summon active.

When you reach 5th level, you summon a ghoul, when you reach 11th level, you summon a ghast, and when you reach 17th level, you summon a greater zombie. In the case that you summon a ghast, you and your allies are immune to its stench.
You know the cantrip, and it doesn’t count against your number of wizard cantrips known.

Prerequisite: School of Transmutation

You have developed a special transmutation cantrip, called Transmute Object. It requires verbal and somatic components, is cast as an action, and allows you to transmute a simple, mundane, nonliving Tiny object into another. For example, you could transmute a lantern into a broadsword.
You know the cantrip, and it doesn’t count against your number of wizard cantrips known.

Prerequisite: School of War Magic
Your attacking cantrips are particularly potent. When you make an attack roll with a cantrip, you may reroll any of the dice, and must use the new roll.
